Normal distribution

Source: vignettes/Distributions-Normal.Rmd
Distributions-Normal.Rmd

Probability density function:

f(x)=1Ïƒ2Ï€eâˆ’(xâˆ’Î¼)22Ïƒ2f(x) = \frac 1 {\sigma\sqrt{2\pi}} e^{-\frac{(x-\mu)^2} {2\sigma^2}} with Î¼\mu the mean of the distribution and Ïƒ\sigma the standard deviation

Cumulative distribution function:

F(x)=âˆ«âˆ’âˆx1Ïƒ2Ï€eâˆ’(yâˆ’Î¼)22Ïƒ2dy=âˆ«âˆ’âˆxâˆ’Î¼Ïƒ12Ï€eâˆ’z22dz=12[1+erf(xâˆ’Î¼Ïƒ2)]F(x) =\int_{-\infty}^{x}\frac 1 {\sigma\sqrt{2\pi}} e^{-\frac{(y-\mu)^2} {2\sigma^2}}dy =\int_{-\infty}^{\frac {x-\mu}{\sigma}}\frac 1 {\sqrt{2\pi}} e^{-\frac{z^2} {2}}dz =\frac 1 2 \left[1+\text{erf}\left(\frac {x-\mu} {\sigma\sqrt{2}} \right)\right] with erf\text{erf} being the error function.

Log-likelihood function:

L(Î¼,Ïƒ;X)=âˆ‘i[âˆ’12ln(2Ï€)âˆ’ln(Ïƒ)âˆ’12Ïƒ2(Xiâˆ’Î¼)2]L(\mu,\sigma;X)=\sum_i\left[-\frac 1 2 \ln(2\pi)-\ln(\sigma)-\frac{1}{2\sigma^2}(X_i-\mu)^2\right]

Score function vector:

V(Î¼,Ïƒ;X)=(âˆ‚Lâˆ‚Î¼âˆ‚Lâˆ‚Ïƒ)=âˆ‘i(Xiâˆ’Î¼Ïƒ2(Xiâˆ’Î¼)2âˆ’Ïƒ2Ïƒ3)V(\mu,\sigma;X) =\left( \begin{array}{c} \frac{\partial L}{\partial \mu} \\ \frac{\partial L}{\partial \sigma} \end{array} \right) =\sum_i\left( \begin{array}{c} \frac {X_i-\mu}{\sigma^2} \\ \frac {(X_i-\mu)^2-\sigma^2}{\sigma^3} \end{array} \right)

Observed information matrix:

ğ’¥(Î¼,Ïƒ;X)=âˆ’(âˆ‚2Lâˆ‚Î¼2âˆ‚2Lâˆ‚Î¼âˆ‚Ïƒâˆ‚2Lâˆ‚Ïƒâˆ‚Î¼âˆ‚2Lâˆ‚Ïƒ2)=âˆ‘i(1Ïƒ22(Xiâˆ’Î¼)Ïƒ32(Xiâˆ’Î¼)Ïƒ33(Xiâˆ’Î¼)2âˆ’Ïƒ2Ïƒ4)\mathcal J (\mu,\sigma;X)= -\left( \begin{array}{cc} \frac{\partial^2 L}{\partial \mu^2} & \frac{\partial^2 L}{\partial \mu \partial \sigma} \\ \frac{\partial^2 L}{\partial \sigma \partial \mu} & \frac{\partial^2 L}{\partial \sigma^2} \end{array} \right) =\sum_i \left( \begin{array}{cc} \frac{1}{\sigma^2} & \frac{2(X_i-\mu)}{\sigma^3} \\ \frac{2(X_i-\mu)}{\sigma^3} & \frac{3(X_i-\mu)^2-\sigma^2}{\sigma^4} \end{array} \right)
